name: I BELIEVE I'M A FLY
description:
Explore the thrillingly mundane world of a fly, full of many dangers and many great rewards. In this retro-style adventure game, the player navigates through 5 rooms to win the game, evading  death and traps caused by perilous house plants and toxic bug spray. Heavy trash bags block your way.  Do your best to satiate your hunger through collecting points through rewards, because after all, you are a hungry fly. 

Navigation: left, down, up, right arrow keys

apples: 1 point

bananas: 2 points

meat: 3 points

mushroom: unlock portal to next room

Sound attributions: 

8-bit adventure: Eric. ematyas 2018

Portal/Chomp/Key: tim.kahn on freesounds.org
